gameframework.particles.behaviors

Class DyingParticleBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior
      • gameframework.particles.behaviors.DyingParticleBehavior

  • public class DyingParticleBehavior
extends ParticleBehavior
    This behavior will remove the particle after a certain time

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDead(Particle particle)
      Return true if the particle's time to live has expired

    • Constructor Detail

      • DyingParticleBehavior

        public DyingParticleBehavior(ParticleBehavior behavior,
                             int timeToLive,
                             boolean fadeOpacity)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        behavior - Particle's behavior
        timeToLive - Time before the removal of the particle
        fadeOpacity - If this is true, the particle will gradually disappear (particle's opacity will decrease as it's approaching its death)

    • Method Detail

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead(Particle particle)
        Return true if the particle's time to live has expired
        Overrides:
        isDead in class ParticleBehavior
        Parameters:
        particle - The particle to test
        Returns:
        True if the particle is dead, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ParticleBehavior.isDead(gameframework.particles.Particle)

      • update

        public void update(Particle particle)
        Will gradually decrease the opacity of the particle if "fadeOpacity" was set to true
        Overrides:
        update in class ParticleBehavior
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to update
        See Also:
        ParticleBehavior.update(gameframework.particles.Particle)
